trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that specifies scope of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*> as a page, document, or sequence of documents.
trans-unit.target: Een inventarisatiewaarde die bereik van aangeeft de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>als een pagina, document of reeks van documenten.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>

trans-unit.source: Based on the scope of defined by `printTicketLevel`, the number of pages or the number of documents associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.
trans-unit.target: Op basis van het bereik van gedefinieerd door `printTicketLevel`, het aantal pagina's of het aantal documenten die zijn gekoppeld aan de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default printer settings to use when the document is printed.
trans-unit.target: Opgehaald of ingesteld van de standaard printerinstellingen moet worden gebruikt wanneer het document wordt afgedrukt.

trans-unit.source: Setting the CurrentPrintTicket property does not validate or modify the specified <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Instellen van de eigenschap CurrentPrintTicket is geen valideren of de opgegeven <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>voor een bepaalde <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> wijzigen

trans-unit.source: If needed, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specific <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is valid for a given printer.
trans-unit.target: Indien nodig, gebruiken de <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>methode voor het maken van een <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specifieke <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>die geldt voor een bepaalde printer.</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default printer settings to use when the document is printed.
trans-unit.target: De standaardprinterinstellingen moet worden gebruikt wanneer het document wordt afgedrukt.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the scope of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee wordt een waarde die aangeeft van het bereik van de <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired"> </xref> gebeurtenis.

trans-unit.source: When the CurrentPrintTicketLevel property is <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of documents output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Wanneer de eigenschap CurrentPrintTicketLevel is <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>, de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A>eigenschap geeft u het aantal documenten uitvoer met de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>

trans-unit.source: For other CurrentPrintTicketLevel values, the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A> property specifies the number of pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Voor andere CurrentPrintTicketLevel waarden, de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A>eigenschap geeft u het aantal pagina's uitvoer met de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.Sequence%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumeration that indicates the scope of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired"></xref> event as for a sequence of documents, a single document, or a single page.
trans-unit.target: Een opsomming zijn die het bereik van de <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter.WritingPrintTicketRequired"> </xref> gebeurtenis als voor een reeks van documenten, één document of één pagina.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of documents or pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee wordt het aantal documenten of's uitvoer met de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>, the Sequence property specifies the number of documents output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Wanneer de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A>eigenschap is <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel>, de Sequence-eigenschap geeft het aantal documenten uitvoer met de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.PrintTicketLevel> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A> values, the Sequence property specifies the number of pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Voor andere <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A>waarden, de Sequence-eigenschap geeft het aantal pagina's met de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket%2A> uitvoer</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicketLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of documents or pages output with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.
trans-unit.target: Het aantal documenten of's uitvoer met de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.WritingPrintTicketRequiredEventArgs.CurrentPrintTicket*>
